metadata.title: CVE-2019-15690 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
heap buffer overflow in libvncclient/cursor.c related to large cursorsizes when connected to a malicious server

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15690` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.12+dfsg-9ubuntu0.1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.12+dfsg-9ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.12+dfsg-9ubuntu0.1').
x11vnc package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
